This game is, without a doubt, one of the best video games I've ever played. I thought the first Portal was phenomenal, but this is even better. It is a perfect sequel. Not just in terms of being a sequel to Portal, but any sequel ever.

When I first entered most rooms and chambers, my initial thought was that I wasn't going to be able to figure this puzzle out. But after taking in the surroundings, trying different things, and thinking critically, solving each one was extremely satisfying. These puzzles have a way of making the player feel very intuitive and rewarded upon completion.

Everything about this game is fantastic. Atmosphere, music, voice acting, pacing, level and puzzle design.

Very fun and challenging game. Co-op is also a great addition to portal. I highly recommend this game, especially at such a low price. A must have game, also not to mention, easy to run on any computer. You could run it on a potatoe. If Glados can be uploaded into a potatoe, that isn't a reason why your potatoe can't run this amazing game. Have fun portaling and warping the fabric of time and space!
O multiplayer é uma obra prima

长达11小时的剧情内容，丰富曲折的故事线，意料之外的反转，完美的融合在这部作品中，无论是现代感的实验场地，还是陈旧的实验设施都颇具挑战性。各种道具的搭配使用带来意想不到的效果，在这里解密，前进，每一关都带来一种成就感。个人还是喜欢前段剧情的话痨w，后面的黑化还是让我感到伤心。最后被无数玩家吹爆的月球历险记就不在赘述，最后还是想说，你们体验过头朝下落地的感觉吗,真的一点都不晕，真的，真的，[spoiler]假的[/spoiler]

Though this game was released nearly 10 years ago, it holds up. My hours don't show it, but I've played this game around three times now and I'm just now playing through a fourth. Everything is very well done- from the puzzle of the testing chambers, to the beautiful scenic and atmospheric design, to the compelling and well-paced story- and little Easter eggs here and there make the game charming and enjoyable no matter how many times you've seen it. A classic that should belong in every Steam library.

Very fun and hard puzzle game, would recommend.  It is very challenging but my personal speedrun is 4:18:23.
That was after I had beat the game and I knew all of the puzzles beforehand.  The first time I played it took me a total of 13 hours to beat (It was not 13 hours in a row).  Would easily buy again.  The first one was also really good.  I recommend both but you do have to be 10+ (probably) to be able to figure out all of the puzzles (without tutorials).  Buy both game s in the Portal series and you will not be disappointed. 10/10
